(Secure Facility) participant Owner as Owner/Operator
(Enterprise) participant Registry as DID Registry
(Public Ledger) Note over Device, Factory: Manufacturing Phase Factory->>Device: 1. Inject Identity Key (EK) Device->>Factory: 2. Return Public EK Factory->>Registry: 3. Register Reference (SerialNumber -> PubKey) Note over Device, Owner: Onboarding Phase Owner->>Device: 4. Power On & Connect Device->>Device: 5. Generate Attestation Key (AK) Device->>Owner: 6. Send Attestation (Quote(AK) signed by EK) Owner->>Registry: 7. Verify EK Trust Chain Registry-->>Owner: Valid Manufacturer Owner->>Device: 8. Issue Root PoA (Bind AK to Owner DID) Device->>Device: 9. Store PoA in Secure Flash Note right of Device: Device is now
